originalTitle: Dozens of Muslims 'massacred' in Nigeria for refusing to join jihadists, says governor
title: Dozens of Muslims 'massacred' in Nigeria for refusing to join jihadists, says governor
content: At least 78 bodies have been buried, while there are fears that around 170 people were killed altogether.

title: At the scene: Muslims killed 'over rejection of extremist ideology' in Nigeria
content: At least 78 bodies have been buried, while it's feared that more than 170 people were killed altogether.

originalTitle: Remaining worshippers kidnapped in Nigeria church abduction freed
title: Remaining worshippers kidnapped in Nigeria church abduction freed
content: They were among 177 people seized last month from during church services in northern Kaduna state.

originalTitle: What the US and Iran are about to negotiate over isn’t clear
title: What the US and Iran are about to negotiate over isn’t clear
content: After weeks of military threats and arguments over a venue, the US and Iran are about to hold talks in Oman.

originalTitle: Gaza flotilla organisers in South Africa warn against Israeli interception
title: Gaza flotilla organisers in South Africa warn against Israeli interception
content: Activists announced at a briefing in South Africa plans to launch the largest civilian-led flotilla to Gaza in March.

originalTitle: US treasury secretary declines to rule out future Federal Reserve lawsuits
title: US treasury secretary declines to rule out future Federal Reserve lawsuits
content: Scott Bessent used a Senate appearance to defend President Donald Trump's campaign to slash interest and raise tariffs.

title: Russia and Ukraine exchange prisoners as peace talks end without breakthrough
content: The swap - the first since October - sees 157 Ukrainians and 160 Russians returned home.

title: Starmer apologises to Epstein victims for believing Mandelson's 'lies'
content: The PM says the depth of the pair's relationship was not known when he was appointed US ambassador.

originalTitle: Suspect identified in disappearance of four-year-old in Australian outback
title: Suspect identified in disappearance of four-year-old in Australian outback
content: Gus Lamont was last seen playing outside his home on a remote sheep station on 27 September.

title: Leicester docked six points for financial breaches
content: Leicester City are docked six points by the English Football League for breaking profit and sustainability rules.

title: Arsenal lack of respect behind outburst - Rosenior
content: Chelsea boss Liam Rosenior says Arsenal were affecting his side's warm-up prior to the second leg of their Carabao Cup semi-final at Emirates Stadium.

title: Free agent Oxlade-Chamberlain close to Celtic move
content: Former Arsenal and Liverpool midfielder Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain close to joining Scottish champions Celtic.
